message.entry: データはベクトルでなければなりません。
Data must be between the lower and upper values for ''Support''.
Data must be positive when ''Support'' is ''positive''.
Data must be nonnegative when ''Support'' is ''nonnegative''.
Data must be negative when ''Support'' is ''negative''.
Lower bound must be less than the upper bound.
''Kernel'' value must be ''normal'', ''parabolic'', ''box'', ''triangle'', or a function handle.
Observation weights and the sample data must contain the same number of elements.
カスタム カーネル関数は、入力行列と同じサイズの行列を返さなければなりません。
